p: Such an example may include separate subbranch of a phylogenetic cluster of subtype A including Krasnoyarsk 53, 62, 135, 39, 66, 34, 43, 114, 12, 26, and 69 ( Figure 3). All those HIV variants were isolated from PWID except for Krasnoyarsk 43 isolated from a man with HIV infection detected in 2017 who reported a probable infection route via HS.
